title.en: Descent of the Compassionate Blessings of King Gesar, Great Lion of this World

text.en: Hrīḥ! Great lion of this world, emanated through the compassion
text.en-trans: hrih, tsa sum kündü pema tötreng gi

text.en: Of Pema Tötreng Tsal, embodiment of all the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tukjé ku trul dzamling sengchen jé

text.en: Together with thedralas,wermas, brave warriors and maidens,
I invoke you all with intense and fervent devotion:
Consider us lovingly with compassion and come here now.
text.en-trans: tukjé tsé gong tanda dir shek la

text.en: During this, the end of time, rife with fivefold degeneration,
text.en-trans: nyikma ngaden dü kyi tama dir

text.en: We have no other hope, no other source of refuge but you.
text.en-trans: khyé lé resa kyabné zhen mepar

text.en: To safeguard the fresh seedlings of the dharmic lineage,
text.en-trans: chöden rik kyi nyugu sungwé chir

text.en: Confer your compassionate blessings upon this fortunate one
And make plain the signs and symbols of great inspiration.
text.en-trans: kalden di la tukjé jingyi lob

text.en: Forge from this body a fortress for the dralas and wermas,
text.en-trans: lü la drala wermé pakhar chö

text.en: Bless my body, speech and mind as the three vajras,
text.en-trans: go sum dorjé sum du jinlab né

text.en: Increase my intelligence, confidence, power, strength and capacity,
And grant me the attainment of universal victory,
text.en-trans: kham sum si sum wang du duwa yi

text.en: Bringing all three realms and planes of existence under my control.
text.en-trans: chok lé nampar gyalwé ngödrub tsol
